title: KIDS INTERACTIVE GAME - MIDNIGHT PLAY by Kveta Pacovska
description:
IT&#039;S A SMALL FILE: PLEASE, SEED!!!!

Midnight Play is a unique interactive experience for children and children-at-heart. This highly creative and engaging CD-ROM brings to life the colorful and fanciful works of Kveta Pacovska, an award-winning Czechoslovakian children&#039;s book illustrator. With music by Japanese Academy Award nominee, Michiru Oshima, and computer animation by the acclaimed French company, Dada Media, Midnight Play becomes a spontaneous interactive fantasy. 
                            THERE IS NO TEST
the story is implicit. It begins with the first click of the mouse, as the player enters a dark and quiet theatre.
